titleStmt.title: Singing the psalmes the duty of Christians under the New Testament, or, A vindication of that gospel-ordinance in V sermons upon Ephesians 5, 19 wherein are asserted and cleared I. That, II. What, III. How, IV. Why [brace] we must sing / by Tho. Ford ...
titleStmt.author: Ford, Thomas, 1598-1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.B. for F. Eaglesfield, and are to be sold ...,
